info: The third and last series released for Gundam M.S War based on the original Mobile Suit Gundam anime series. There were no booster set released for this series. Although there were images of booster packs on the starter deck box, none exist. There are no Gold Stamped card in this series either.

cards.name: Side-7
cards.battle_scars: Destroy two of your M.S. cards.

effect.text: Reduce all EF M.S. and Pilot cards' Price by 1.

cards.name: Luna II
cards.battle_scars: Destroy one of your M.S. cards.

effect.text: Increase all EF M.S. Type 'Battleship' cards' Clash Points by 1.

cards.requirements: More than 1 EF M.S. Type 'Battleship' card.

cards.name: Jabrow
cards.battle_scars: Opponent draw 3 cards from their Supply Base.

effect.text: Increase all Defending M.S. cards' Clash Points by 1.

cards.requirements: More than 2 EF M.S. Type 'Battleship' cards.

cards.name: Operation V
cards.effect: Move a Gundam M.S. card from the Dry Dock to your hand.
